page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO MAWNAN
page.content: { Mawnan was an isolated parish with a closely knit community who relied on agriculture for their living. With the onset of{transport}the village of Mawnan Smith grew and many retired people moved into the area. With the lack of{industry}in the area now most people have to find employment elsewhere. Mawnan is an area of out standing natural beauty therefore {tourism}is now a major attraction. There are some interesting footpaths along the coast leading to beautiful beaches. The{climate}is warm and sunny in the summer when the village is bursting with holidaymakers and in the winter it is mild and wet and everything is peaceful and quiet. The local community are very friendly and there are many activities to join.
